channel.title: [508] Help with errors on making quests, narrowed down to two
channel.description:
So i used co nick's 508 quest tut and i came up with 21 errors which i narrowed down to two. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432175.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432175.0.html[/url]
[code].\Bulby\.\io\PacketManager.java:962: 'else' without 'if' else ^ .\Bulby\.\io\PacketManager.java:1095: orphaned case case 224: ^[/code]
This is what 962 looks like: [code]else if(p.Dialogue == 111) { p.Dialogue = 0;[/code]
And the quest i added is in between the existing dragon slayer and case 224. If anyone could help me that would be great. Im using Berky-Scape 508 btw

item.title: [508] Help with errors on making quests, narrowed down to two
item.dc:creator: @MnMMatthew MnMMatthew
item.description:
@MnMMatthew wrote:

Assuming this is what you want… Included end of Dragon Slayer from PacketManager.java

else if(p.Dialogue == 110) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7478, 25); p.Dialogue = 0; p.QuestPoints = +2; p.DragonSlayer = 5; p.addSkillXP(180650 ,0); p.addSkillXP(180650 ,2); p.frames.showInterface(p, 277); p.frames.setString(p, "Congratulations!", 277, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "You have completed the Dragon Slayer quest!", 277, 4); p.frames.setString(p, "Quest Points:", 277, 6); p.frames.setString(p, ""+p.QuestPoints, 277, 7); p.frames.setString(p, "2 Quest Points", 277, 10); p.frames.setString(p, "Ability to wear rune platebody", 277, 11); p.frames.setString(p, "Ability to wear dragon chainbody", 277, 12); p.frames.setString(p, "180,650 Strength XP", 277, 13); p.frames.setString(p, "180,650 Attack XP", 277, 14); p.frames.setString(p, "25 Dragon Tokens", 277, 15); p.frames.setString(p, "", 277, 16); p.frames.setString(p, "", 277, 17); p.frames.removeChatboxInterface(p); } p.Dialogue = 111; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 211, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Sir Percival", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "I am to become king, but i fear my people do not like me.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 111) { p.Dialogue = 0; p.ThisIsElora = 1; p.frames.showChatInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 211, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Sir Percival", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Speak to the peasants to learn my approval.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 112) { p.Dialogue = 113; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 211, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Sir Percival", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "I heard about the renegades. They work for the Fisher King.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 113) { p.Dialogue = 114; p.ThisIsElora = 3; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 211, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Sir Percival", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Even now he gathers goblin fodder. Find and tell him he's failed.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 114) { p.Dialogue = 0; p.frames.setString(p, "How can I find a route to YOUR LOCATION HERE?", 458, 1); p.frames.setString(p, "Where can I find the right ship?", 458, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "How can I ITEM3 PURPOSE HERE?", 458, 3); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 458); p.Smithing = false; p.Cooking = false; p.TalkAgent = false; p.DecorChange = false; p.Choice = 1; } else if(p.Dialogue == 115) { p.Dialogue = 116; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 214, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Peasant", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "The king wants to know if we approve of him?", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 116) { p.Dialogue = 117; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 214, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Peasant", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Our answer is no. While he prepares for the ceremony, two", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 117) { p.Dialogue = 0; p.ThisIsElora = 2; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 214, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Peasant", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "renegade knights attack our bank. Kill them and tell him about it.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 118) { p.Dialogue = 0; p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 220, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "The Fisher King",241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "So you've thwarted my plans. Good job. News will return.", 241, 4); } else if(p.Dialogue == 119) { p.setCoords(3013, 3355, 1); p.Dialogue = 0; p.BoatTimer = 6; p.frames.showInterface(p, 544); p.frames.removeChatboxInterface(p); } else if(p.Dialogue == 120) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7478, 75); p.Dialogue = 0; p.QuestPoints += 1; p.ThisIsElora = 5; p.addSkillXP(15000 ,1); p.frames.showInterface(p, 277); p.frames.setString(p, "Congratulations!", 277, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "You have completed the This Is Elora quest!", 277, 4); p.frames.setString(p, "Quest Points:", 277, 6); p.frames.setString(p, ""+p.QuestPoints, 277, 7); p.frames.setString(p, "1 Quest Point", 277, 10); p.frames.setString(p, "15,000 ATTACK XP", 277, 11); p.frames.setString(p, "75 Dragon Tokens", 277, 12); p.frames.setString(p, "", 277, 13); p.frames.setString(p, "", 277, 14); p.frames.setString(p, "", 277, 15); p.frames.removeChatboxInterface(p); }
